item.title: CVE-2024-35705|2024-06-08T14:11:14.061Z -- ciprian%20popescu -- block%20for%20font%20awesome
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ciprian Popescu Block for Font Awesome allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Block for Font Awesome: from n/a through 1.4.4.
